text: Bomarea hartwegii is a species of flowering plant in the family Alstroemeriaceae. It is native to Peru and to Ecuador, where it has only been collected twice, in the Pichincha Province. It is threatened by habitat destruction.Mogollón, H. and N. Pitman. 2003. Bomarea hartwegii. In: IUCN 2013. IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2013.1.
